availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph R. Davis (Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Katherine Borders Davis. Father of Christina Davis, William Davis, Michael Davis, Bierna Davis, Martin Davis, Hezekiah Davis, Jedediah Davis, David Davis, Samuel Davis, Mary Davis, Francis Davis, Syricy Davis, and Elizabeth Davis. Farmer in Lawrence County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 102B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County,, p. 637.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, District 10, p. 295A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 1871.
